message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AR, cs.NA, cs.MS, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on optimizing matrix-matrix multiplication on GPUs, which is a common task in parallel computing. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is also likely as the paper discusses the challenges and characteristics of implementing the optimization on NVIDIA Volta GPGPUs. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is relevant as the paper deals with numerical computations and optimization of matrix-matrix multiplication. 
- cs.MS (Mathematical Software) is relevant as the paper uses code generation and autotuning to achieve flexibility and tailored implementations. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is also relevant as the paper discusses the strategies of parallelization and thread distribution, as well as the mapping scheme used for the implementation.
